column4: How do i mount my camera? In other words, how do i mount my USB removable drive,thingy.. in Feisty Fawn ???
Mine doesn't
I can see it ass a USB device in "lsusb"
Doesn't mean it has the proper module assosicated with the device.
How do i solve it then?
Find the supported module for your device. Google is the best place to start.
Which USB device?
Bus 005 Device 003: ID 04c8:072f Konica Corp.
Is that a camera?
Yes.. Its a Konica Revio 420Z
You should be able to just mount that camera and extract the pictures ..
Ubuntu has that option automatically compiled in the kernel.
But nothing happens when i connect it
You said nothing happens eh? When you plug the camera in, does anything happen?
Nothing other than that it pops up in the list "lsusb"
hrm... I would of thought it reconized it as a mass storage device. For instance a pen drive.
you can try
mount /dev/sda1 /dir/dirc
mount /dev/sdaX /dir/dirc
What do you mean with /dev/sdaX
I mean, you are mounting. That's a manual mount
I'm out for lunch. I will talk to you when I get back if you are around
Thanks, and bon apetit..
